normalized: that night--
i secluded myself, together with several of my subordinates, in the military operations room.
already, the illumination inside the warship had fallen, and now, pale, blue, blinking lights showed.
by universal federation regulations, the normal, bright lighting was on from 600 (6am) hours until 2100 (9pm) hours.
the lighting changed into the pale, blue lighting from 2200 hours to 600 hours, which was regulated constantly by the warship.
this, of course, was for energy conservation purposes, but….
from long time study, attaching a distinction between night and day while living on a warship helps to improve the crew's soundness and mental health.

name: lutz
normalized: --captain!
thereupon my aide, lutz, had rushed into the room in a flurry.

name: bohgan
normalized: what is it?
lutz, exposing his excitement, raised his voice at my inquiry.

name: lutz
normalized: it's as you deduced, captain

name: bohgan
normalized: is that so

name: lutz
normalized: yes.
every nook and cranny of the warship has been bugged with listening devices!

name: subordinates
normalized: ohh!?
all at once, my subordinates stirred at lutz's report.
as i thought…they're keeping an eye on me.
nevertheless, i wasn't happy that they were right on the money about me.
again, fully realizing how well lieri and naomi had prepared had filled me with terror.
feeling suspicious of the two women teeming with so much composure, i had made use of lutz….
i had made a thorough check of the places where naomi was being shown around in the time lieri dined with me and had eliminated the spying devices.
if they assume we're defending around the clock the existence of a secret room that's shielded from the outside, of course that information would be invaluable.
thinking of it in that way, lieri was diligently planning to use our activity intelligence for the benefit of finding our trends and attitudes.

name: lutz
normalized: it's just this military operations room that is safe.

name: bohgan
normalized: and, concerning suspicious warships?

name: lutz
normalized: yes.
i searched at the highest ranges, but i wasn't able to locate any suspicious warships.

name: lutz
normalized: as well as course information, there is no information regarding warships cruising nearby

name: bohgan
normalized: is that so…
i had thought that when something important came up, that new solar warships would be standing by, but that didn't look to be the case.
a new solar/neo terror confrontation would certainly be important, but the attitude regarding the universal federation army didn't mean they could make moves hastily.
hence, the new solar warships had received some sort of different orders, and weren't patrolling nearby in case of an emergency.

name: bohgan
normalized: …if we assume they aren't protected from the outside, the only fear now is a gun turtle
it had come down to the matter of the reliability of lieri and naomi bringing the unmatched power of a gun turtle inside a warship.

name: subordinate 1
normalized: g, gun turtle….
the soldiers rustled nosily.

name: subordinate 2
normalized: if they have a gun turtle in their possession, that would make attacking them difficult, wouldn't it
the other soldiers nodded in agreement at those words.

name: bohgan
normalized: fufufuu…this time things will be different with our superior guests.
i have a plan
i looked around at my subordinates while smiling intrepidly.

name: bohgan
normalized: all right.
it's been decided.
as i thought, the plan will be carried out tonight
a commotion of excitement leaked out from the soldiers with my decision.

name: bohgan
normalized: i will be taking the lead.
i'm taking four essential soldiers

name: subordinate 3
normalized: ehh!
yourself, captain!?

name: subordinate 4
normalized: n, no way!?
that's too risky!
voices of protest were raised all at once from my subordinates.

name: bohgan
normalized: don't worry!
i seemed to shout out to calm the boisterous mood in the military operations room, getting their attention by raising both of my hands into the air.

name: bohgan
normalized: i also have a backup plan.
it'll be fine.
…by the way, what's the state of them in their room?

name: subordinate 5
normalized: yes.
nothing strange.
they're sound asleep
my subordinate observed a computer terminal, but seemed to reply immediately.

name: bohgan
normalized: …is that so
i stepped up before the image on the computer terminal and peered into the display.
the state of lieri's room reflected within.
i had a hidden camera installed beforehand, which was now displaying the dimly lit room.
it certainly looks like the two are in bed and completely asleep.

name: bohgan
normalized: …ok
having finished confirming the state of the room, i turned around to face my officers again.

name: bohgan
normalized: listen up, this is lieri bishop's war!
i assure you victory this night!

name: subordinates
normalized: ohh!

name: bohgan
normalized: as for the tactics….
and now.
at last, the time had come to carry it out.
the goal of the raid was to get lieri and naomi.
if just that was a success, afterwords, i could give them memory implants using the brainwashing devices and "cook" the two to my heart's content.
the five of us, including me, held guns, as we headed towards the section where lieri's vip room was located.
in order to avoid the safeguards naomi had installed, we had taken a detour to an established location there.
the near-impossible detoured location involved going through vents and the like, but we had made progress silently.

name: bohgan
normalized: …what's their status?

name: subordinate
normalized: 『nothing strange』
at any time i called for it, i asked for a detailed confirmation of the status of lieri and naomi via the hidden camera.
of course, it was all highly encrypted.
eventually, having arrived as far as the front door of their room, the two had been asleep the whole time.
in a changing era, however much weapons had evolved, the tactics in using them had not changed.
releasing the lock on the door without a sound, we suddenly broke into the room in one swift surge.
i was the last to go in.
lieri and naomi were--
my team had split into two groups and had surrounded each of their beds, and as they tore away their blankets at the same time--!
i suddenly became speechless.
the two women were nowhere to be seen.
in lieri and naomi's places were round, metallic balls.

name: soldier 1
normalized: captain!?

name: soldier 2
normalized: hii!
that means!?
the soldier's eyes became fraught with terror at seeing those balls.

name: soldier 3
normalized: gun turtles!?

name: soldier 1
normalized: fuck!
it's a trap!

name: bohgan
normalized: wait!
don't shoot!
my soldiers were falling into a panic.
i raised my voice in hot haste.
my angry voice was erased by the bellow of my subordinates' gunshots.
56 millimeters were no match for an armored gun turtle.
metallic noises were heard as the gun turtles morphed and pointed the nozzles of the phasor machine guns at my subordinates.
flashes flying about.
my subordinates' screams.
it felt entirely like deja vu.
i quickly threw myself behind a piece of furniture.
as soon as the flashes that had killed my subordinates had stopped, an armed naomi had suddenly appeared before my eyes.

name: bohgan
normalized: kuu!?
and coming up from behind naomi--was lieri.
it seems that the two had been hiding in the restroom from the get-go.
the situation was completely different from what i had validated from the hidden camera.
becoming aware they were being observed by a camera, i guess they had shown us a different image, replacing it somehow.
in any case, i had been completely deceived by the two.
i stood up in front of lieri and naomi with a gun turtle at my back, raising both of my hands into the air.

name: naomi
normalized: …hmph!
the captain himself came, it's an honor

name: naomi
normalized: go ahead.
that way i can shoot you dead without thinking twice
naomi provoked me while still using her hands to manipulate the gun turtle.
i remained expressionless as i continued raising my hands that held a gun into the air.

name: lieri
normalized: …i didn't expect you to be such a stupid man.
i had thought you were a bit more clever than this
lieri spoke in a cool voice.

name: bohgan
normalized: pardon me…if i didn't live up to your expectations
lieri curved her mouth suddenly at my response.

name: lieri
normalized: i am taking over by a universal federation charter, this warship is now under my command!
lieri announced in a loud voice like that, smiling at me like she had lost her mind.

name: lieri
normalized: fufuu.
i don't want to look at your useless form any more than this if possible, are you going to cooperate with me now?

name: bohgan
normalized: kuu….
i surveyed my surroundings with my hands still in the air.
a cord from the hidden camera was connected to a computer.

name: bohgan
normalized: （it's as i thought…these conniving bitches）
one of the two was apparently experienced at hacking….
no, perhaps both of them were….
i smiled bitterly all of a sudden.

name: bohgan
normalized: …so that's why

name: bohgan
normalized: you said you're prosecuting the neo terrors' key figures.
as might be expected, you've come prepared

name: naomi
normalized: hey!
are you not going to cooperate!?
naomi, who was getting impatient, raised her voice.

name: naomi
normalized: let me point out that i can operate as many as four gun turtles at once

name: naomi
normalized: there is no possible chance of winning if any of you try to contend with me!

name: bohgan
normalized: four at the same time…kukukuu, what a deadly prodigy you are…i give in.
it is my loss

name: naomi
normalized: now, throw away your gun nice and slowly!
naomi dipped her chin, seeming to give me an order.

name: bohgan
normalized: throw away…my gun?

name: naomi
normalized: i'm not going to ask you again
scowling at me, naomi took a nefarious sounding tone with me.

name: bohgan
normalized: understood…
curling my lips wickedly, i tossed the gun i was holding to the floor.

name: lieri
normalized: wait!?

name: naomi
normalized: --ehh!?
at that moment, lieri raised her voice like she had noticed something.
however, it was too late.
coincidentally as my gun fell upon the floor, the door of the room shut and locked.
at the same time as that happened, a gas began spewing forcefully out of my uniform.
lieri and naomi covered their mouths and noses with their hands in a panic.

name: lieri
normalized: this is!?

name: naomi
normalized: kuu!?
youu!
what the hell are you thinking!
naomi's kick knocked into the right side of my face, blowing off my gaudiness.

name: bohgan
normalized: fufufuu
fresh blood trickled down from the edge of my mouth as i got up laughing at the ordeal.

name: bohgan
normalized: …you didn't take into count the hidden camera

name: lieri
normalized: bo, bohgan….

name: naomi
normalized: …kuu!?

name: bohgan
normalized: tossing away my gun onto the floor was a signal
while wiping the blood away with my arm, i gave a derisive smile.

name: lieri
normalized: ukuu…!?
n, never… you sacrificed yourself…!?
lieri warped her face, looking to be in pain, worried about the gas she was breathing in.

name: bohgan
normalized: kukukuu, don't worry.
it's only hypnotic gas
the world swayed before me.
having inhaled quite a lot of the gas, my consciousness grew hazy and i felt my field of vision begin to blur greatly.

name: naomi
normalized: …uu, uu…!?
at last, naomi was fainting.
the console in her hands tumbled to the floor and made a loud noise.

name: lieri
normalized: n, naomi…!?
kuu--!
lieri, now reeling on her feet because of the gas, also seemed to be on the verge of collapsing, which went against the fearless expression she had on her face.

name: lieri
normalized: hmph

name: bohgan
normalized: smiling….
gradually.
gradually my consciousness faded.
the shape of lieri bending her knees and slumping onto the floor faintly reflected in my now hazy field of vision.
i heard a sound far off in the distance.
my field of vision steadily grew darker.

name: bohgan
normalized: …why did she smile…
feeling a little distraught, i fell upside down into a bottomless pit of black.
